title: Subway Map-Based MOOC Design and Learning Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: MOOC design environment applying conceptual metaphor theory and locus method, with collaborative learning using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze knowledge structures by visualizing MOOC content using a subway map metaphor.
Achieve over 80% information reproduction by spatially memorizing key learning points using the method of loci.

Through project-based activities (four-week units), learners will select one local community issue (e.g., waste sorting improvement, lack of youth leisure spaces), design solutions in three stages (problem analysis–solution design–implementation plan), and submit improvement proposals after achieving 4 points or higher on peer evaluations (5-point rubric scale).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
